title: Aisorjo27
author: Aisorjo27
content: I want to start trading with crypto in kinguin.net and buysellvouchers.com ! they are selling gift card at a lower price . 0.4% fees for buyer and 0.3% for seller .. which is a great deal . Anyone tried this website before ?

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: I'm not familiar with the first one but buysellvoucers do have an account in this forum IIRC. If I'm not wrong, it is this one[1]. They also have an ann thread over there but there are not many reviews[2]. I guess most people are just buying instead of selling gift cards so you don't see many reviews. I think I guess you can take a look there and ask if you do have some questions. Btw, you already made a similar thread asking about this. I think you can just bump that thread in the future instead of making a new one.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=989661[2] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1884536.msg62228344#msg62228344

comments.author: SquirrelJulietGarden
comments.body: [List] Gift cards providersPaxful shut down their service weeks ago, their CEO Ray resigned but they just resumed their service days ago.You can checkhttps://noones.com/https://civkit.org/ (under development)With gift card trading, you must be careful and always use Video recorder to have video of the trading process which you will need for dispute later. Gift card is a payment method which is favorite by scammers.

comments.author: ilybloko
comments.body: Happiness is a complex emotion that can be described as a feeling of joy, contentment, and satisfaction.voip phone service

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: Quote from: Aisorjo27 on May 11, 2023, 08:04:17 PMI want to start trading with crypto in kinguin.net and buysellvouchers.com ! they are selling gift card at a lower price . 0.4% fees for buyer and 0.3% for seller .. which is a great deal . Anyone tried this website before ? Since you're considering your service to include the general exchange of gift cards with cryptocurrencies, this discussion ay not best fit on this board except if your consideration is centered only on bitcoin exchange for gifts cards payments, however it will be more preferred you move the thread to service board or to altcoins discussions board where it could be properly discussed by members.
